title: A Family for the Orphans
description: Three little hearts have been broken. Now they must find a way to heal them…   Tragedy turned Walker McCaw from bachelor cowboy to guardian of his late best friend’s three children. Now they’re living on a new horse farm—and it’s a disaster. Trisha Campbell’s arrival couldn’t come at a better time. Together, they’ll need to work to save the struggling farm. But it takes more than hard work to make a family. It takes courage and love…From Love Inspired: Uplifting stories of faith, forgiveness and hope.
author: Heidi Main
